text: Oui, j'avais des grandes amitiés. Oui. D'ailleurs quand on est allé à Saturna...
translation: Yes, I had great friendships. Yes. When we went to Saturna...

text: Je lui ai dit. Je lui ai raconté comment ça a été pour moi, une image vraiment biblique, d'arriver dans ce brouillard qui faisait pas de bruit dans le brouillard et sous une petite lampe, un parapluie et sous le parapluie c'était John...
translation: I told him. I told him what it was like for me, a really biblical image, to arrive in this fog that made no noise in the fog and under a little lamp, an umbrella and under the umbrella was John...

text: C'etait Bill et Remi, ils attendaient là. Sous la pluie, dans la nuit, qu'on descend.
translation: It was Bill and Remi, they were waiting there. In the rain, in the night, as we went down.

text: Et c'était comme si elle venait de quitter l'école. J'ai eu cette impression que vraiment, je reviens te chercher pour la énième bêtise.
translation: And it was like she had just left school. I had this feeling that really, I'm coming back to get you for the umpteenth stupidity.

text: Et c'etait veignt ans qui a passé?
translation: And it was twenty years that had passed?

text: Plus que ca!  Certainement.  Mais c'etait exactement comme si elle avait quittée hier.
translation: More than that! Certainly. But it was exactly as if she had left yesterday.
